title: Les Sesterain Ou le Miroir 2000: Episode 6
description: It's winter again at Le Miroir. Robert Flandin is back on the slopes, fulfulling all the hopes Francois has invested in his career. Pierre is still refusing to go to University, instead making vague plans to become a farner like his father. The tension between father and son runs high and Pierre decides to leave to work in a ski factory.  Credits: Producer, Pierre Long ; director, Francois Villiers ; writers, Andre Maheux, Francois Villiers ; photography, Paul Soulignac, Henri Raichi ; music, Francois de Roubaix. Cast: Etienne Bierry, Jean-Claude Dauphin, Marie-Christine Barrault, Georges Claisse, Yves Lefebvre, Christian Alers, Marthe Villalonga, Marie-Helene Breillat.
